posts.author: WizardlyWisdom
posts.content:
I've been thinking about spells lately and wanted to get everyone's opinions.

Quick question about spells that came up in our game last night.

I'd love to hear everyone's experiences with spells and how it's worked in your games.

What do you all think? Has anyone else had similar questions about spells?

posts.author: ClericofChaos
posts.content:
Has anyone tried optimizing a build around Cleric? I'm curious about the best way to leverage this for my character.

The best campaign moment I ever had involved creative use of Cleric to solve what seemed like an impossible puzzle.

I think the RAW (Rules As Written) for Cleric are clear, but many DMs seem to interpret it differently.

posts.author: RogueReroll
posts.content:
Our table uses a house rule for Cleric where we allow more flexibility in how it's applied. It's been working well so far.

How do other DMs balance encounters that involve Cleric? I find it either makes combats too easy or too difficult.

I've been playing a Goliath Paladin in my campaign, and I've noticed that Cleric really impacts how effective the character is in combat.

I actually disagree with some of the previous comments about Cleric. Based on my experience, it works differently.

posts.content:
